data.message: That's something really awesome. Just one question, how are you gonna do it? I mean you have the money, with money comes all resources required. So are you just providing money or is it more than just money and awareness?

replies.message: Thanks for your question, Rahul. Our goal and intent is to help stop Ebola. We hope to accomplish this through a number of efforts in addition to raising awareness and providing and facilitating financial support. Some of these efforts include providing educational information to West Africa and connectivity to those actively working to stop this disease. To learn more about our efforts and what you can do to help, please visit Facebook.com/fightebola. -Jenny
Kinda skirted the issue.  How much money is FB putting up??
Aka  we're going to get them all on facebook so we can make even more money. Will you also force them to use the messenger. The Ebola edition
I wonder why every time I refresh my Newsfeed the Ebola thing keeps popping up after i click it away , it becomes annoying .
